name: Corah
summary:
Ready for a new life? Relaxing oldschool MMORPG vibes. Combine relaxing, idle gameplay with classic MMO themes. Download & start playing and relaxing today.

Corah is a relaxing semi-idle MMORPG. Explore a new fantasy world with no ads, no energy system and a vibrant community. Return to the era of classic games with simple 2d UI and retro MMO feels. With no level cap and no pay to win, Corah is the mobile MMORPG of 2024.

Corah seeks to revive the old school MMORPG feeling on mobile. Relax while your character does the rest. Play as any of four classes, each with three sub-classes. Hunt monsters, collect equipment, increase your stats and skills, and play in real time with other players. Manage your game, don’t control it. Corah avoids annoying mobile controls and allows you to chill while your characters do everything.

Explore a vibrant fantasy world in Corah. Increase your character’s stats and skills as you hunt monsters, join castle raids and level up. Collect and upgrade equipment to better outfit your character. Earn daily rewards and achievements as you continue playing. Get pets for your character and increase their stats and upgrade them to best help you level up.
